snippet: As organizers plan new demonstrations, they worry that they are under scrutiny with the same controversial methods used in Muslim communities.
abstract: Occupy Wall Street organizers plan new demonstrations, but express concerns that they face intense scrutiny, fears that are increasing in face of New York City's treatment and monitoring of Muslim communities.
lead_paragraph: As organizers plan new demonstrations, they worry that they are under scrutiny with the same controversial methods used in Muslim communities.

headline.seo: Occupy Wall Street Protesters Complain of Police Monitoring
headline.main: Wall Street Protesters Complain of Police Surveillance
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Protesters Complain of Police Surveillance
